org.netbeans.spi.debugger.ui

Interface PersistentController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Controller

    public interface PersistentController
extends Controller
    Controller, that is able to persist it's customized state.

    2.46

      • getDisplayName

        String getDisplayName()
        Display name, that characterizes the current customized state of this controller.
        Returns:
        The display name

      • load

        boolean load(Properties props)
        Load customized state from properties.
        Parameters:
        props - The properties to load the state from.
        Returns:
        true if the properties were successfully loaded, false otherwise.

        void save(Properties props)
        Save customized state into properties.
        Parameters:
